translations: n.一点儿，极少量；法新（1961年以前的英国铜币，等于1／4便士）

phrs.translation: 法新, 法辛, 名字, 毫不介意
史蒂芬·法辛, 娉叠緵
前轮大后轮小的自行车, 前轮大后轮小的脚踏车
奥森农场, 奥尔森法辛

sentences.sentence: The ancestor of the modern bicycle was called a penny-farthing.
sentences.translation: 现代自行车的原型称作penny-farthing（一种前轮大后轮小的自行车）。

sentences.sentence: The pickpockets had stripped him of his last farthing.
sentences.translation: 扒手把他最后一分钱都偷走了。

sentences.sentence: Nobody had bought anything of her the whole livelong day; no one had given her a single farthing.
sentences.translation: 整整一天谁也没有向她买过一件东西；没有人给她一个铜板。
